attributes.action: Remove the new changes to the Highway Code that started on 29/01/21
attributes.additional_details: Go back to the highway code as it was before the 29th of January 2021
attributes.background: Undo the new Highway Code that is came into effect on 29/01/21 in terms of the pedestrian having the right of way over vehicles when crossing the road. This is dangerous, how is it acceptable for a car to be expected to just stop when coming off a road at speed because a pedestrian has right of way

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

'Revoke recent changes to the Highway Code': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
